Take a photo of yourself and print it out. You could also create a digital image of yourself and save it on your phone or computer.
Ask a friend or family member to describe your appearance to you in detail. You could also ask them to take a photo of themselves and compare it to your description.
Look at your reflection in water, such as in a pond or a bowl of water.
Use a reflective surface, such as a spoon or a piece of foil, to look at your reflection.

Consider how your reflection might change if you were to change your surroundings or clothing. For example, if you were to wear a different color or style of clothing, you might see a different reflection in the mirror.
